name: get_airtable_records

base_id.description: base_id of the airetable url, normally this is the first id in the url. For example, in the url below, the base_id = appXMW95SJTHF5gZV in the URL = https://airtable.com/appXMW95SJTHF5gZV/tblXcps5szISfWoRb/viwO1db7QPUB3rskl?blocks=hide

table_id.description: table_id of the airetable url, normally this is the second id in the url. For example, in the url below, the table_id = tblXcps5szISfWoRb in the URL = https://airtable.com/appXMW95SJTHF5gZV/tblXcps5szISfWoRb/viwO1db7QPUB3rskl?blocks=hide

description: Get a list of data from airtable
